Text: Important News Concerning your Ameritrade AccountDear Valued Customer Get CommissionFREE trades Deposit a check for or more into an existing account before August and get commissionfree Internet equity trades For the required special deposit slip and more information log on at and visit the Customer Benefits page Quarterly Maintenance Fee Effective May a quarterly account maintenance fee may be assessed to your account if you have less than in total liquidation value Your account will be excluded from this fee if it is a beneficiary account or an IRA it has been open less than six months you have had at least four executed trades in the account in the last six months Fees will assessed on the following days for this calendar year May August and November Paper Trade Confirmation Fee Effective July a fee will be assessed to your account for each trade confirmation sent via US Mail AVOID THIS FEE by signing up for our FREE Electronic Trade Confirmations service Log on at and click on the Electronic Trade Confirmations link located on the myAccount tab to sign up now Updated Privacy Statement Protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal and financial information is one of our highest priorities To learn how we gather use and protect your personal information review the Ameritrade Privacy Statement attellmemoreprivacy policyfhtml Sincerely J Peter Ricketts President Ameritrade Inc These fees will be automatically deducted from your account and will appear on your account statement If you currently receive Email Trade Confirmations you will automatically be enrolled in this new delivery service Ameritrade understands the importance of protecting your privacy If you do not wish to receive news about new and valuable Ameritrade services in the future please hit your reply button type unsubscribe in the subject line and send the note Well gladly exclude you from future marketing messages Member SIPC Ameritrade is a registered service mark of
